name: Kokis (New Year Cookies)
description: Crispy flower-shaped cookies, New Year essential
instructions: Dip hot mold in batter (don't cover top)
Kokis will drop off when ready
cultural_notes: Symbol of New Year, requires special mold
description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මල් හැඩැති කුකීස්, අලුත් අවුරුදු අත්යවශ්යයි
description_tamil: மிருதுவான பூ வடிவ குக்கீகள், புத்தாண்டு அவசியம்
cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ සංකේතය, විශේෂ අච්චුව අවශ්ය වේ
